column3: Click the black X button to clear all filters

column4: The interface returns to the initial state as per 1.1.1

column3: Go to the DOAJ admin journal search at /admin/
Open the In DOAJ facet, and select "False"

column4: None of the journal titles in the search results are links
All the journal titles in the search results are links
You are taken to the DOAJ ToC page for this journal

column3: Click back (as many times as required) in your browser window to go back to the search results
Click on the "Home page" URL for a journal result

column4: You are taken to the Journal's home page

column3: Click back in your browser to go back to the search results
Click on the "Owner" of a journal result

column4: You are taken to the user account page for the journal owner

column3: Click back in your browser to go back to the search results
Select one of the CC licences from this facet

column4: All the journal results show the relevant CC icon under the metadata field "License"
All the journal results show that the journals have publication charges, and provide a link to the Journal page

column3: Clear all the search filters with the Red X in the search bar
Find a journal in the search results which has a "Related Record"

column4: You are taken to the application search results, and a single search result is present, showing the applicaiton which produced that journal

column3: Click back in your browser window to return to the journal search
Look at the bottom of each journal record

column4: You have an option to make a preceeding or succeeding continuation
You have an option to Edit this journal
A new browser window opens containing the continuations form '[Journal title] continues...'
A new browser window opens containing the continuations form '[Journal title] is continued by...'
A new browser window opens containing the edit form for the journal
